title: Feature: Real-Time Data Sync
body:
Implemented WebSocket-based sync:

- Live updates across clients
- Automatic reconnection on network loss

See [the docs](./docs.md#usage).

title: Bugfix: Login Loop Issue
body:
Fixed an authentication bug where users were caught in a login loop when cookies expired. Thanks to @contributor for the report!

> Ensure your cookies are cleared before updating.

title: Initial Alpha Release
body:
Released the first alpha build for testing:

```bash
download alpha.zip && unzip alpha.zip
```

title: Project Kickoff
body:
Project kickoff! We:

1. Set up the repo
2. Defined project goals
3. Created issue templates

Looking forward to collaborating.
